LanguageData.ColonistBarHiding.MessageAllEntriesHidde: All colonist bar entries have been hidden. To access this menu again, go to Options->Mod Settings->Colonist Bar Hiding.
LanguageData.ColonistBarHiding.NoCurrentGame: The "Edit hidden colonists..." button is disabled because you opened the mod settings menu from the main menu.
LanguageData.ColonistBarHiding.ColonistIsHidden: This colonist is currently hidden from the colonist bar.
